data.what_is: Regal.io is the outbound phone and sms sales solution built to drive more conversations so B2C brands can hit their growth goals way faster. 100+ leading brands including SoFi, Ro, Angi, The Farmer's Dog, Fidelity Life, Career Karma and AAA use Regal.io to proactively engage their customers in real-time with event-driven calls and text messages, which result in higher conversion and more revenue.
data.product_description: Regal.io empowers businesses to add a human touch at key moments in their online experiences in order to win customers over and drive more sales. Our branded, event-driven calls and texts skyrocket answer rates by treating customers like royalty, and drive 25%+ more revenue.

initial_reviews.review_title: User Friendly Platform with Lightning Fast Chat Support

The best thing so far regarding Regal's CRM is that you can speak with a member of their support team in seconds! They are always so helpful and axious to assist. The features that the platform has is easily implented as well as easy to use. Integration is usually seemless and well assisted. The compay I work for frequently uses the platform with no issues.

What do you dislike about Regal.io?
I would like a feature that allows you to send out mass texts without creating a campaign or journey.

What problems is Regal.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
Regal is bridging the gap between our accounts and the company's representatives.

initial_reviews.review_title: Customer service, pricing and leadership not trustworthy
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Regal.io?
It has branded calling built in which was one reason we tried to work with them in the fist place

What do you dislike about Regal.io?
Their customer service has been slow and unresponsive, their pricing reflects a premium product which it is not: it has continued to misplace our leads experience outages, and generally be unreliable for the last 6 months. They promise features that resemble what a true CRM can provide but then end up releasing them in a buggy, half-based way which causes lost revenue.

Lastly their leadership has proven to be untrustworth in pricing negotiations threatening to turn off service on the spot in order to get a contract signed at their desired terms.

What problems is Regal.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
Contacting our customers via phone

initial_reviews.review_title: "Regal helped us improve connect rates with their branded caller ID and spam remediation services"
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Regal.io?
Regal.io is honestly the best customer service company. They work closely with you to make sure they can fulfill your needs. The spam remediation and call branding work seamlessly. They provide an admin portal to manage and set up new numbers for spam remediation and call branding. They are very responsive: They are quick to respond to any questions or concerns you have, and they make sure to follow up to ensure you're satisfied with their service.
They are reliable: They consistently deliver high-quality service and meet their commitments on time.
They are professional: They maintain a high level of professionalism in all their interactions with clients, and they are always courteous and respectful. They are knowledgeable: They have deep expertise in their field and can provide valuable insights and advice to help you make informed decisions. They are trustworthy: They have a proven track record of delivering high-quality service and treating their clients with integrity and honesty.

What do you dislike about Regal.io?
The only thing I dislike about regal is that we did not know about them earlier. They are a great company and provides great service. I do not have anything that is negative about the company or the service.

What problems is Regal.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our calls were being marked as spam which was negatively impacting our answer rates. Not only has Regal helped us remove those spam flags, but we have also been able to make sure customers know our brand is calling, helping us connect with more customers and improve agent efficiency.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great software, even better team
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Regal.io?
The journey orchestration system in Regal is excellent. The flexibility it offers us and the ability to experiment has made a huge difference in our sales conversion.

What do you dislike about Regal.io?
There are many small nits: search in the audience page isn't great, the data model doesn't work for all business use cases, and much of the logic we'd like to have control over (call routing, agent assignment, etc.) is in the back-end. Compensating for these nits are an awesome customer success/implementation team, an extremely fast-moving product org, and a resultant slew of upgrades and changes that have made Regal a real pleasure to work with/use.

What problems is Regal.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
-Branded Caller ID: People pick up the phone!
-Journeys/Automation: We can be very perscriptive/experimental about how we conduct sales
-Excellent Analytics: We can see exactly what is happening, where, when, and with whom
-Interoperability: The webhook feature in the journeys + excellent data-in make Regal extremely flexible

initial_reviews.review_title: Regal is one of the best B2C outbound phone and SMS sales solutions that I have tried
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Regal.io?
Regal is one of the first tools to allow creating journeys that are truly focused on the actions taken by users within the product. It provides marketers with the ability to create interactive, engaging experiences tailored to their specific needs, while also providing insights into user behavior and preferences. With Regal, businesses can create highly targeted and personalized campaigns that drive results.

What do you dislike about Regal.io?
The lack of email campaigns. Although we understand that they are working on that feature. We look forward to the day when this feature is available, as it will open up a world of possibilities.

What problems is Regal.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
Regal simplifies the complexity we previously had when integrating our phone and SMS campaign communications with users in just a couple of clicks, providing a wealth of data to analyze their effectiveness.

What do you dislike about Regal.io?
We have tried numerous other voice-over IP solutions that all are the same; Regal set itself apart by providing productivity and reliability. They deliver on what they say and more.

What problems is Regal.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our company has struggled with low call connection rates for the last couple of years. We found Regal when looking to solve our problem and were blown away by how well they solved it! Not only did their solution improve the outbound number display, but it also increased our call connections tremendously. Once they proved they could boost our call connections, we switched from our old VOIP provider to Regal Voice. Regal voice is a game-changing solution that has dramatically increased our lead-setters performance. The future is looking bright for Regal. The team has been incredible, and we can't wait to see what they come up with next.

initial_reviews.review_title: Game Changing Software For Call Centers
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Regal.io?
Regal has allowed me to cut my staff in half. My team's speed to lead has gone from 4 minutes to under 1 minute and our answer rates have increased from >6% to over 37% with their branded caller ID. The journey workflows create an automation sequence that helps my team be able to work on the hottest leads at the right time while keeping colder leads engaged. Their implementation team is awesome! I've had the direct pleasure of working closely with Stefanie and Enrico. They are great at what they do and always find a solution for me.

What do you dislike about Regal.io?
I am really looking forward to the email component that is coming soon. That is going to help make my team even more efficient.

What problems is Regal.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
Regal has helped increase our answer rates, our speed to lead, and our conversion rates. Their branded caller ID is a powerhouse but tied with their dialer system, it has helped me create a more efficient workflow and team. It also helps keep my team more engaged. It's a lot easier to do your job when people answer the phone.

all_reviews.review_title: Great software, even better team
all_reviews.review_content:

The journey orchestration system in Regal is excellent. The flexibility it offers us and the ability to experiment has made a huge difference in our sales conversion.

What do you dislike about Regal.io?
There are many small nits: search in the audience page isn't great, the data model doesn't work for all business use cases, and much of the logic we'd like to have control over (call routing, agent assignment, etc.) is in the back-end. Compensating for these nits are an awesome customer success/implementation team, an extremely fast-moving product org, and a resultant slew of upgrades and changes that have made Regal a real pleasure to work with/use.

What problems is Regal.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
-Branded Caller ID: People pick up the phone!

-Excellent Analytics: We can see exactly what is happening, where, when, and with whom
-Interoperability: The webhook feature in the journeys + excellent data-in make Regal extremely flexible

all_reviews.review_title: Game Changing Software For Call Centers
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Regal.io?
Regal has allowed me to cut my staff in half. My team's speed to lead has gone from 4 minutes to under 1 minute and our answer rates have increased from >6% to over 37% with their branded caller ID. The journey workflows create an automation sequence that helps my team be able to work on the hottest leads at the right time while keeping colder leads engaged. Their implementation team is awesome! I've had the direct pleasure of working closely with Stefanie and Enrico. They are great at what they do and always find a solution for me.

What do you dislike about Regal.io?
I am really looking forward to the email component that is coming soon. That is going to help make my team even more efficient.

What problems is Regal.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
Regal has helped increase our answer rates, our speed to lead, and our conversion rates. Their branded caller ID is a powerhouse but tied with their dialer system, it has helped me create a more efficient workflow and team. It also helps keep my team more engaged. It's a lot easier to do your job when people answer the phone.

Regal lets us personalize outreach across channels at key revenue generating moments. They do everything to ensure that our SMS and phone outreach is timely and based on event-driven triggers, and then they give our agents an easy tool to engage appropriately. Through journeys and segmenting, they also have a wide array of options to curtail campaigns to target specific customers, and they have a branded caller ID feature which drives higher connect rates by showing customers our brand name when we call cell phones.

What do you dislike about Regal.io?
I would like to see better functionality to smooth outbound volume based on capacity and inbounds at a given time.

What problems is Regal.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
We switched to Regal for the concierge program to be able to get the branded caller id, journey builder and sms and voice communication in one unified agent desktop. We are seeing great results from our concierge program.

all_reviews.review_title: Fantastic Tool, Equally Fantastic Team
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Regal.io?
As a tool Regal Voice has already led to a significant improvement in clients seeing a branded number when our team calls. But in addition to this, the Regal team has been incredible. They are supportive, helpful, and always quick to assist with our questions and confusion!

What do you dislike about Regal.io?
We really do not have any dislikes or downsides! Everything has been very positive so far. :)

What problems is Regal.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
Before, our phone numbers were showing as "Spam" for users. With Regal implemented, clients now see a branded number. This has improved answer rates when our team calls clients.
